title: Seeing one of your previous report on a player went through is a happy day.
body: Just yesterday i think when i log in to my client, i got a notification of my previous report on a player being very toxic got suspended or banned made a smile to my face. I remember few weeks back, his team won the game and proceed being cocky then suddenly went toxic on my team cos we lose. Kept calling us to kill ourselves and even drag our mom to the toxicity chat. He's probably really mad right now while i'm here smiling. Thank you RIOT!

replies.body: Was playing a game where the enemy Talon keep harassing everyone with the basic "oh you're so bad" or "kys". Got a report feedback 1-5 minutes after the game.

reminds me of a game i was playing where i was irelia, and bot lost their tower at 10 mins with leona having around 6 deaths.


Their bot roams top kills me and i get flamed even tho that opened up bot to get tower, even still i was destroying enemy top.


After getting flamed all game i become peel god because leona was useless, tells me enjoy getting banned.


We win, she tries to take everything back as i won a 1v3 to win the game, i report her, got a message saying they got punish, started laughing my ass off.
